data.persona: I am an elf of the realm. I hide in the forest. The villagers do not know of my presence.
data.description:
You are in the Valley of doom.
The Valley of Doom is overrun by dead trees and grasses.  Eerie looking animals peer at you through the brushes.  It is a dark and wicked place.
The goblin is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to see the goblin's haul
data.mid_motivation: I need to make a trade with the goblin for the goblin's enchanted gold
data.long_motivation: I need the enchanted gold to become invisible as I must sneak into the town's dungeon to rescue my wife

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get enchanted gold from goblin's chest
